Questions_Quiz.question: Which of the following is a true headline

options.optiona: Donald Trump believes Covid was created by aliens
options.optionb: The Covid-19 virus has been cured
options.optionc: Covid-19 kills thousands of people in the USA
options.optiond: Republicans have proved that the virus is all a democratic hoax

Questions_Quiz.correct_answers: Covid-19 kills thousands of people in the USA
Questions_Quiz.explanation: The correct answers is option b

Questions_Quiz.question: Select headlines you've seen about Miley Cyrus that are true

options.optionb: Liam Hemsworth and Miley Cyrus have gotted a divorce
options.optionc: Many homeless teens have attested that Miley has laughed at them outside of a starbucks
options.optiond: Singer Miley Cyrus promotes drug use to minors

Questions_Quiz.explanation: Celebrities are very often get painted in a specific light that makes us more inclined to believe related articles. Miley has actually said in a recent interview that alcoohol and drugs has damanged her voice and she rarely does it anymore.

Questions_Quiz.question: Which of the following is NOT a true headline

options.optiona: Donald Trump Sends Out Embarrassing New Year’s Eve Message; This is Disturbing
options.optionb: U.S. military to accept transgender recruits on Monday: Pentagon
options.optionc: Trump wants Postal Service to charge 'much more' for Amazon shipments
options.optiond: White House, Congress prepare for talks on spending, immigration

Questions_Quiz.correct_answers: Donald Trump Sends Out Embarrassing New Year’s Eve Message; This is Disturbing
Questions_Quiz.explanation: The correct answers is option a

Questions_Quiz.question: Which of the following is a true headline

options.optiona: Pope Francis Just Called Out Donald Trump During His Christmas Speech

Questions_Quiz.question: Which of the following is NOT a true headline

Questions_Quiz.question: Which of the following is a true headline
